note:
string, cookery, ancient-medieval materials science, SF/F, #SCA, world mythologies, and whatever else interesting that falls through my transom

Profile header alt text: four skeins of Icelandic singles wool yarn dyed with natural dyes (weld, madder, woad), on top of a plaid cloth woven with the same wool. The raw yarn was commercial; the dyeing and weaving are my work.

Avatar alt text: a photo of a white thumb and two fingers grasping a tuft of wool, weaving it into an existing web of cloth

fields.name: STRING
fields.value: working with fibers, especially spinning, dyeing, braiding, weaving, knitting

fields.name: HOUSEBOOKS
fields.value: if someone wrote down a recipe for it, I'm interested:  cooking, chemistry, textiles, etc.
